name: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: Official government portal with policies, programs, and initiatives for women's development in India

name: National Commission for Women
description: Statutory body concerned with advising the government on all policy matters affecting women

name: NITI Aayog - Women Entrepreneurship Platform
description: Initiative to promote and support aspiring and existing women entrepreneurs in India

name: UN Women - India
description: UN entity working for gender equality and women's empowerment in India

name: Women Web
description: Digital platform and community for Indian women with content on career development and entrepreneurship

name: Sheroes
description: Women's community platform offering support, resources, and opportunities for career development

name: The/Nudge Foundation
description: Non-profit working to alleviate poverty through sustainable livelihoods, with programs focused on women

name: JobsForHer
description: Portal connecting women with jobs, especially those returning to the workforce after career breaks

name: Federation of Indian Women Entrepreneurs
description: Network of women entrepreneurs promoting economic empowerment through enterprise development

name: Women in Technology (WiT) India
description: Forum focused on increasing women's participation in STEM through mentorship and career development

name: NASSCOM Foundation
description: Technology industry association with initiatives for digital literacy and tech skilling for women

name: SEWA (Self Employed Women's Association)
description: Organization of self-employed women workers with programs for livelihood development

name: TiE Women
description: Initiative to foster entrepreneurship among women through mentoring, networking, and funding

name: NITI Aayog - Women Transforming India Awards
description: Annual awards celebrating women achievers and change-makers across India

name: LinkedIn - Opportunities Hub for Women
description: Resources and opportunities for women to develop skills for in-demand jobs
